title: Ensure Service Principals cannot create and use profiles
description: Prevent Service Principals from creating and using profiles in Microsoft Fabric to limit privilege escalation and unauthorized access.
displayName: Ensure Service Principals cannot create and use profiles
rationale: Preventing Service Principals from creating and using profiles limits the risk of privilege escalation and unauthorized access.
impact: Some automation scenarios may require review to ensure compliance with this restriction.

remediation.text:
1. Navigate to Microsoft Fabric https://app.powerbi.com/admin-portal
2. Select Tenant settings.
3. Scroll to Export and Sharing settings.
4. Prevent Service Principals from creating and using profiles as per organizational policy.
